valid: For the period 18:00 (UTC) on Mon 20 Oct 2025 to 18:00 (UTC) on Tue 21 Oct 2025
general_synopsis: Low Lundy 981 losing its identity. Low Hebrides 985 slow moving, deepening 977 by midday tomorrow
